title: CoreWeave signs $14 billion AI infrastructure deal with Meta
description: (Reuters) -CoreWeave said it has signed a $14 billion agreement with Meta to supply computing power, the latest multi-billion dollar deal as businesses ramp up infrastructure to meet the demand for artificial intelligence applications.
content:

title: CoreWeave pops amid new $14B deal with Meta for AI power
description: CoreWeave (CRWV) shares popped 8.7% in premarket trading on Tuesday amid a new $14.2B deal with Meta Platforms (META) for artificial intelligence computing power. Read for more.
content:

title: Most companies aren’t seeing a return on AI investments. This tech CEO wants to change that

title: Shots - Health News
description: People are using ChatGPT and other artificial intelligence apps to help them with emotional issues, but experts say they are not a substitute for therapy or companionship.
content:

title: Labour’s AI Drive Faces Fossil Fuel Pressure at Party Conference
